Articles.Content:
Hi all,

I was wondering if anyone knows of a mod that allows for a custom science tree? I'm asking because it feels like having access to jet engines, wings and general "air plane" type parts would be more logical at the start. This question might have been asked before, I have a feeling I asked it somewhere before but I never got an answer so any help would be appreciated.

Thanks

Peace.

There is a mod, but I think itÃ‚Â´s not working with 23.5

Anyway you can mod it for yourself, just go to ..\Kerbal Space Program\GameData\Squad\Parts\(PartName) and open the part.cfg with an Editor. Under // --- editor parameters --- -> TechRequired you can edit the required technology.
